person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Australia , who hold a 2-0 lead in the five-match test series , overhauled West Indies ' total of 172 all out with eight balls to spare to end a run of six successive one-day defeats .

Let's think step by step.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Australia , who hold a 2-0 lead in the five-match test series , overhauled West Indies ' total of 172 all out with eight balls to spare to end a run of six successive one-day defeats .

Let's think step by step.

1. Australia
2. West Indies
3. five-match test series (implied locations: Australia and West Indies)

In this paragraph, the entities identified as locations are "Australia" and "West Indies," as they represent the countries where the cricket matches are being played. The "five-match test series" is also implied to be taking place in both Australia and West Indies since it's a series between the two teams.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Australia , who hold a 2-0 lead in the five-match test series , overhauled West Indies ' total of 172 all out with eight balls to spare to end a run of six successive one-day defeats .

Let's think step by step.

1. Australia (national cricket team)
2. West Indies (national cricket team)

In this paragraph, "Australia" and "West Indies" are clearly identified as cricket teams, and thus can be considered as organizations in the context of cricket.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Australia (national cricket team)
2. West Indies (national cricket team)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as organizations in the context of cricket.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Australia (national cricket team) |
| West Indies (national cricket team) |
